letters.description: Actively listen and empathize with the parent's experiences and challenges.
Evaluate the home environment, family dynamics, and existing support systems.
Identify and connect the family with relevant resources, therapies, and educational support.
Collaboratively develop and implement tailored strategies to address specific needs and challenges.
Monitor progress, celebrate successes, and adjust strategies as needed.
Equip parents with the skills and confidence to advocate for their child and navigate future challenges.
